themes.title: Discover Fruits
themes.description: Explore your surroundings to discover where fruity secrets are hidden! Follow the clues and scan the QR codes in the correct order to complete your fruity quest.

levels.title: Teacher’s Favorite Snack
hints: I’m red or green and often seen in teachers’ hands. Look where books stand in neat rows — I might be there too.
messages: Nice find! The apple has been crunched.

levels.title: Citrus Mystery
hints: Peel back the layers of your mind. I'm juicy and round — hiding where people quench their thirst.
messages: Zesty move! You’ve uncovered the orange.

levels.title: Summer Surprise
hints: Big, green, and full of pink surprises. Find me where the sun shines and kids run around — maybe near the picnic bench.
messages: You did it! The watermelon is yours. Fruity mission complete!
